# Enchantment (Staff)
## Overview
**Aura** strong enchantment; **CL** 13th

**Slot** none

**Price** 82,000 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

Often made from applewood and topped with a clear crystal, this staff allows use of the following spells:

- *[[Hideous Laughter (Spell)|Hideous laughter]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Sleep (Spell)|Sleep]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Suggestion (Spell)|Suggestion]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Crushing Despair (Spell)|Crushing despair]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Mind Fog (Spell)|Mind fog]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Suggestion, Mass (Spell)|Mass suggestion]]* (3 charges)

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Staff (Feat)|Craft Staff]], [[Crushing Despair (Spell)|crushing despair]]*,* *[[Hideous Laughter (Spell)|hideous laughter]]**, [[Suggestion, Mass (Spell)|mass suggestion]],* *[[Mind Fog (Spell)|mind fog]]**,* *[[Sleep (Spell)|sleep]]**,* *[[Suggestion (Spell)|suggestion]]*

**Cost** 41,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 493
